title: PBE Log Error
body:
I just got PBE and i try updating it and it says "Unspecified error has occurred. Please check logs for more information."
Can anyone please help me i don't know what it means and what i would look for in the logs can someone help me.

replies.body:
Patching issues are pretty similar between the PBE and live server. These issues can be influenced by different factors depending on where you run into issues during patching (what %). We've gathered the most frequent fixes in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I recommend checking it out and working through the steps as a first step.

Let me know if that guide assisted you in resolving this issue.
